src:
V Veliki Pristavi zagorelo gospodarsko poslopje

05 Nov 2019, 11:19


Pivka, 5. novembra - Zjutraj je v vasi Velika Pristava zagorelo gospodarsko poslopje. Zagorelo naj bi seno. Požar so gasilci pogasili, prizorišče požara pa si bodo ogledali tudi kriminalisti. Po prvih ocenah gmotna škoda znaša približno 70.000 evrov, so sporočili s Policijske uprave Koper.



Dobrepolje, Kompolje. Gasilci med gašenjem požara.Foto: Tamino Petelinšek/STA Arhiv STA
text:
A commercial building burned down in Velika Pristava

05 Nov 2019, 11:19


Pivka, 5 November - In the morning in the village of Velika Pristava, an outbuilding was set on fire. It's supposed to burn hay. The fire was extinguished by the fire, and the scene will also be viewed by criminals. According to initial estimates, the property damage amounts to about 70,000 euros, according to the Koper Police Directorate.



Dobrepolje, Kompolje. Firefighters during firefighting.Photo: Tamino Petelinsek / STA
